description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Cradle Mountain, Australia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Tasmania Wilderness Retreat: Cradle Mountain Cabins & Suites with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit
hotels.description: Whisk away on a weekend of nature-filled romance with a tranquil stay in the mountains. Uncover a shining jewel deep in Tasmania's breathtaking Cradle Mountain wilds that puts picture-worthy views at the forefront of every experience. Far from the stressors of daily life, overlooking Cradle Mountain-Lake St Clair National Park in the World Heritage-listed Tasmanian Wilderness, you can find a harmonious blend of rustic charm and modern comfort in cozy cabins, timber-built suites and contemporary Pencil Pine Cabins. Strike a perfect balance between relaxation and adventure, with everything from bushwalks through the thriving reserves to steamy rejuvenation in the Waldheim Alpine Spa. Delve deeper into Tasmania’s abundant nature with a culinary experience like no other. Experience the Highland Restaurant's paddock-to-plate philosophy firsthand with a painstakingly prepared dinner and paired local wines. For something a little more casual, enjoy a hearty meal or warming nightcap at the lodge’s Tavern Bar & Bistro while overlooking the sprawling natural surrounds.

hotels.title: Charming Cradle Mountain Wilderness Retreat with Onsite Dining
hotels.description: Whisk away a special someone for some nature-filled romance with a tranquil stay at this stunning Cradle Mountain escape. Uncover a shining crown jewel deep in Tasmania's breathtaking alpine region with rustic charm and modern comfort in cosy cabins and timber-built suites. Enjoy everything from thrilling bushwalks through the thriving reserves to a moment of rejuvenation at the Waldheim Alpine Spa. Sample the Highland Restaurant's paddock-to-plate philosophy, or for something a little more casual, enjoy a hearty meal and warming nightcap at the lodge’s Tavern Bar & Bistro while overlooking sprawling natural beauty.

seo.title: Hotel a Cradle Mountain - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
